name: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
description: Lead the overall strategic direction and operations of the company, ensuring growth and profitability in the consumer goods and retail sector. Oversee all departments and represent the company to stakeholders.

name: Chief Operating Officer (COO)
description: Manage day-to-day operations, optimize business processes, and ensure operational efficiency across all departments. Collaborate with CEO to implement company strategies.

name: Sales Manager
description: Lead the sales team to achieve sales targets, develop sales strategies, and maintain customer relationships in the consumer goods market.

name: Marketing Coordinator
description: Assist in planning and executing marketing campaigns, manage social media presence, and coordinate promotional events to boost brand awareness.

name: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Develop and implement digital marketing strategies including SEO, SEM, email marketing, and online advertising to increase online sales.

name: Warehouse Supervisor
description: Oversee warehouse operations including inventory management, shipping, receiving, and staff supervision to ensure efficient logistics.

name: Inventory Analyst
description: Monitor inventory levels, analyze stock data, and coordinate with procurement to maintain optimal stock for retail operations.

name: Forklift Operator
description: Operate forklifts to move goods within the warehouse safely and efficiently, assist with loading and unloading shipments.

name: Customer Service Representative
description: Provide excellent customer support via phone, email, and chat, resolve complaints, and ensure customer satisfaction.

name: Customer Service Manager
description: Lead the customer service team, develop policies to improve service quality, and handle escalated customer issues.

name: Procurement Specialist
description: Manage purchasing of goods and services, negotiate with suppliers, and ensure timely delivery of materials for retail operations.

name: Procurement Manager
description: Oversee procurement team, develop sourcing strategies, and maintain supplier relationships to optimize costs and quality.

name: Accountant
description: Manage financial records, prepare reports, handle accounts payable and receivable, and ensure compliance with accounting standards.

name: Financial Analyst
description: Analyze financial data, prepare forecasts, and support budgeting processes to guide business decisions.

name: Payroll Specialist
description: Process payroll accurately and timely, manage employee benefits, and ensure compliance with tax regulations.

name: HR Generalist
description: Manage recruitment, employee relations, benefits administration, and compliance with labor laws.

name: Recruitment Coordinator
description: Coordinate hiring processes, schedule interviews, and assist in onboarding new employees.

name: Logistics Coordinator
description: Plan and coordinate transportation and delivery schedules to ensure timely distribution of goods.

name: Transportation Manager
description: Manage transportation operations, oversee drivers, and ensure compliance with safety regulations.

name: Sales Associate
description: Assist customers in retail stores, manage product displays, and process sales transactions.

name: Marketing Analyst
description: Analyze market trends, customer data, and campaign performance to support marketing strategies.

name: Warehouse Associate
description: Support warehouse operations by picking, packing, and preparing orders for shipment.

name: Customer Support Specialist
description: Handle customer inquiries and provide product information to enhance customer experience.

name: Procurement Assistant
description: Support procurement team with order processing, supplier communication, and record keeping.

name: Junior Accountant
description: Assist with bookkeeping, invoice processing, and financial data entry under supervision.

name: HR Assistant
description: Provide administrative support to HR department including maintaining employee records and scheduling interviews.

name: Logistics Assistant
description: Assist in coordinating shipments, tracking deliveries, and maintaining logistics documentation.
